animpage.uninstall-text: This will uninstall app and properly delete all related assets from your shop.
animpage.unsubscribe-text: This will cancel your current subscription. All additional features will be unavailable.
animpage.subscription-text: One of options you selected is available only via montlhy 5$ subscription. After clicking Checkout you will be redirected to Shopify Checkout page. If you do not want to unlock all additional features marked with "*", just press Cancel.
animpage.hint: * Features marked with asterics are available only via subscription. You will see payment confirmation when try to save page settings with one of these options seleted.
